About me

Web Developer and UX/UI Designer

I am a Web Developer, and I'm very passionate and dedicated to my work.

I have 9+ years of experience providing high-impact web solutions for diverse industry organizations, skilled in designing, developing and testing multiple web-based applications incorporating a range of technologies. Aspiring to combine broad background with strong technical skills to excel as a Front-End Developer.

I have acquired the skills and knowledge necessary to make your project a success.
